Class ChessBoard

java.lang.Object
com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.model.ChessBoard
public class ChessBoard extends Object
Represents the chess board with pieces and game logic. Manages board state, piece movement, attacks and promotions.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    PieceInfo[][]
    pieces
    2D array representing the pieces on the board.

    • pieces

      public PieceInfo[][] pieces
      2D array representing the pieces on the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChessBoard

      public ChessBoard(int size, HashMap<String,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture> textures)
      Constructor for the class.
      Parameters:
      size - the size of the board in pixels
      textures - HashMap containing Texture for each chess piece

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, float offsetX, float offsetY)
      Draws the chessboard and pieces.
      Parameters:
      batch - the SpriteBatch user for drawing
      offsetX - the x-coordinate offset for drawing
      offsetY - the y-coordinate offset for drawing

    • getPiece

      public PieceInfo getPiece(TargetPoint location)
      Gets the piece in a specified location.
      Parameters:
      location - the target location on the board
      Returns:
      the piece at the location, or null if no piece exists there

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece(TargetPoint from, TargetPoint to)
      Moves a piece from one location to the other. Handles captures, promotions and updates the score. Logs movement, attack and promoting.
      Parameters:
      from - the starting location of the piece
      to - the destination location for the piece

    • getPoint

      public TargetPoint getPoint(int x, int y)
      Converts screen coordinates for board coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate on the screen
      y - the y-coordinate on the screen
      Returns:
      a TargetPoint representing the board coordinates

    • isInBounds

      public boolean isInBounds(TargetPoint location)
      Checks if the location is within the bounds of the chess board.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to check
      Returns:
      true if the location is on the board, false otherwise

    • getRectangle

      public IntRect getRectangle(TargetPoint point)
      Gets a rectangle representing a square on the board.
      Parameters:
      point - the board coordinates
      Returns:
      an IntRect representing the square

    • setOnAttackListener

      public void setOnAttackListener(AttackListener listener)
      Sets a AttackListener for attack events.
      Parameters:
      listener - the attack listener to set

    • setPromotionListener

      public void setPromotionListener(PromotionListener listener)
      Sets a PromotionListener for promotion events.
      Parameters:
      listener - the promotion listener to set

    • isPromoting

      public boolean isPromoting()
      Check if the pawn promotion is in progress.
      Returns:
      true if the promotion is in progress, false otherwise

    • setPromoting

      public void setPromoting(boolean promoting)
      Sets the promotion state.
      Parameters:
      promoting - true to indicate if the promotion is in progress, false otherwise
